title: Vehicle Profile V5
description: Vehicle profile object in the user's account. Endpoint: https://wh.route4me.com/modules/api/v5.0/vehicle-profiles

vehicle_profile_id.title: Vehicle Profile ID
vehicle_profile_id.description: A unique identification 32-char string of the vehicle profile

root_member_id.title: Root Member ID
root_member_id.description: An unique identification number of the root member

name.title: Name
name.description: A name of the vehicle profile

deleted_at.title: Deleted At
deleted_at.description: When the vehicle profile was deleted

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When the vehicle profile was created

updated_at.title: Upated At
updated_at.description: When the vehicle profile was updated

fuel_consumption_city.title: Fuel Consumption City
fuel_consumption_city.description: Fuel consumption in the city area

fuel_consumption_highway.title: Fuel Consumption Highway
fuel_consumption_highway.description: Fuel consumption in the highway area

is_predefined.title: Is Predefined
is_predefined.description: If true, the vehicle parameters are predefined.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: If true, the vehicle profile is default.

vehicle_profile_code.title: Vehicle Profile Code
vehicle_profile_code.description: Internal code of the vehicle profile (e.g. '28DTRA' for 28 foot double trailer).

height_unit.title: Height Unit
height_unit.description: Vehicle height unit. Available values are 'm' and 'ft'.

width_unit.title: Width Unit
width_unit.description: Vehicle width unit. Available values are 'm' and 'ft'.

length_unit.title: Length Unit
length_unit.description: Vehicle length unit. Available values are 'm' and 'ft'.

weight_unit.title: Weight Unit
weight_unit.description: Vehicle weight unit. Available values are 'kg' and 'lb'.

max_weight_per_axle_unit.title: Maximum Weight Per Axle Unit
max_weight_per_axle_unit.description: A unit of the maximum weight per axle. Available values are 'kg' and 'lb'.

fuel_consumption_city_unit.title: Fuel Consumption City Unit
fuel_consumption_city_unit.description: Fuel consumption unit in the city area. Available values: 'mpg', 'mi/l', 'l/100km' 'km/l'.

fuel_consumption_highway_unit.title: Fuel Consumption Highway Unit
fuel_consumption_highway_unit.description: Fuel consumption unit in the highway area. Available values: ''mpg', 'mi/l', 'l/100km' 'km/l'.

max_weight_per_axle_uf_value.title: Maximum Weight Per Axle UF Value
max_weight_per_axle_uf_value.description: User-friendly value of the maximum weight per axle (e.g. '15,422 kg').

fuel_consumption_city_uf_value.title: Fuel Consumption City UF Value
fuel_consumption_city_uf_value.description: User-friendly fuel consumption value in the city area. Available values: 'mpg', 'mi/l', 'l/100km' 'km/l'.

fuel_consumption_highway_uf_value.title: Fuel Consumption Highway UF Value
fuel_consumption_highway_uf_value.description: User-friendly fuel consumption value in the highway area. Available values: 'mpg', 'mi/l', 'l/100km' 'km/l'.
